description:
As Yusuke continues his chase of Sensui, the unbelievable Sniper appears. As Genkai and the rest of the team follow, can Yusuke escape Sniper’s endless barrage, reach Sensui, and save Kuwabara?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yusuke aleargă cu mânie! Salvarea lui Kuwabara!
幽助激走! 桑原を救え!
